title: FUNN Releases Cool New Bike Bits for the Lil’ Shredders
content:
For the past 12 to 14 months, FUNN MTB says they’ve been hard at work on a new range of children’s products that are designed to inspire the next generation of mountain bikers. The new products are still made with the same commitment to quality and innovation as all of the FUNN MTB components are, just built for the little ones.

Let’s take a look…

Nixie Stem

Retail: $40

The Nixie Stem offers a blend of affordability and quality. It’s available in a 31.8mm clamp and you can choose between two different lengths, 40mm and 50mm, to help customize fit and handling. Made with a 3D forged body, which delivers durability without compromising weight and offers an excellent price point for cyclists looking to enhance their setup.

Details

  • Material: Aluminum 6061
  • Colors: Black / Red / Grey / Blue / Orange / Green
  • Availability: Early August 2024

Hilt Jr.

Retail: $12

The Hilt Jr. is a downsized version of the popular FUNN Hilt MTB grip. Designed with a smaller inner diameter of 19mm and an outer diameter of 26mm. This makes it the perfect grip for younger riders with smaller hands.

It comes in 11 different color options making it easy to match your lil’ shredder’s unique style.

Details

  • Inner Diameter: 19mm
  • Weight: 72g
  • Color: Black / Red / Grey / Pink / Blue / Olive Green / Orange / Purple / Green / Turquoise / Brown
  • Availability: Now

Taipan S

Retail:$ 40

The Taipan S is made from high-quality glass fiber-reinforced thermoplastic. These pedals strike the perfect balance between durability and affordability. The Taipan S is also designed with a compact size offering your kid supreme comfort underfoot.

Each pedal is equipped with 4 molded pins and 6 alloy pins per side, providing excellent traction no matter where you’re riding. Additionally, special round tip pins are designed to be shin-friendly, minimizing the risk of injury.

Details

  • Material: Glass fiber-reinforced thermoplastic
  • Axle system: CrMo axle w/DU and cartridge bearing
  • Platform size: W95mm x L80mm x H 14mm (S)
  • Weight: 325g / pair (S)
  • Color: Black / Red / Grey / Pink / Blue / Olive Green / Orange / Purple / Green / Turquoise / Brown
  • Availability: Early July 2024

Speedrun Jr Handlebar

Retail: $40

Combining fun and functionality, the Speedrun Jr handlebar is made for the junior cycling enthusiast. It sports a 19mm end section and perfectly pairs with the Hilt Jr grip. This makes it the perfect combo for smaller hands and ensures a secure and comfortable grip for young riders.

This customizable feature allows the handlebar to be trimmed down and tailored to fit. Again, this provides optimal control and confidence on every adventure. The Speedrun Jr is the perfect bar for kids who want to explore the trails.

Details

  • Material: AL6061
  • Colors: Black / Red / Grey / Blue / Orange / Green
  • Availability: Early August

Upturn R75 Handlebar

Retail: $65

The Upturn R75 Handlebar is a high-rise mountain bike handlebar that it designed to provide superior control and comfort during off-road rides. FUNN launched the Upturn Handlebar at Eurobike 2023 with R40mm and R55mm versions.

This year Funn is launching the r75mm version. After having many customers requesting a higher rise, Funn decided to reach a wider market and develop the bar. This version seems to track with the popularity of a more aggressive style of riding. It;s also great for the riders that want a more upright form of riding position.

Constructed from high-quality aluminum alloy, Al6066, the Upturn handlebar is both lightweight and durable and able to withstand the rigors of BMX and aggressive trail riding.

Details

  • Material: AL6066
  • Colors: Black / Red / Grey / Blue / Orange / Green
  • Availability: Early July 2024
